meanings.definition: The state of holding property jointly with others.
meanings.sent1: My siblings and I have cotenancies of our family home.
meanings.sent2: The cotenancies of the apartment building are divided among the tenants.
meanings.sent3: The cotenancies of the beach house led to some interesting family vacations.
meanings.sent4: Their cotenancies in the business world made them a formidable team.
meanings.sent5: The legal document outlined the cotenancies of the shared property clearly.

meanings.definition: The act of sharing ownership of a property with others.
meanings.sent1: Cotenancies can sometimes lead to disagreements among co-owners.
meanings.sent2: The cotenancies of the land were managed through a trust.
meanings.sent3: Their cotenancies in the vacation home made for some memorable summers.
meanings.sent4: The cotenancies of the company were carefully negotiated.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the cotenancies of the estate was crucial for the heirs.
